verbs.description: [ARG0: pfizer] [V: settles] [ARG1: new york probe into deceptive copay coupons] pfizer inc on thursday settled charges by new york attorney general that it misled consumers in its drug copayment coupon program into thinking they would pay far less to fill prescriptions than they ended up having to shell out attorney barbara underwood pfizer new york new york pfizer inc estring
